verses.verse: Then <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> who is <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H7925>him,<s%> rose up early, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> beside the spring of <S%H5878>Harod:<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of <S%H1389>them,<s%> by the hill of <S%H4176>Moreh,<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> who are with you are too <S%H7227>many<s%> for me to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> lest <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6286>vaunt<s%> themselves against <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H3027><s%> 'My own hand has saved <S%H3467>me.<s%>'

Now <S%H4994>therefore<s%> <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3373><s%> 'Whoever is fearful and <S%H2730>trembling,<s%> let him <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H6852>depart<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>'" <S%H6242>Twenty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7604>remained.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> are still too <S%H7227>many.<s%> Bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and I will <S%H6884>test<s%> them for you <S%H559>there.<s%> It shall be, that of whom I tell <S%H3212>you,<s%> 'This shall go with <S%H3212>you,<s%>' the same shall go with <S%H559>you;<s%> and of whoever I tell <S%H3212>you,<s%> 'This shall not go with <S%H3212>you,<s%>' the same shall not go."

So he brought <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H4325>water;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "Everyone who <S%H3952>laps<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> with his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H3952>laps,<s%> you shall <S%H3322>set<s%> him by <S%H3766>himself;<s%> likewise everyone who bows down on his <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>"

The <S%H4557>number<s%> of those who <S%H3952>lapped,<s%> putting their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> but all the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> bowed <S%H3766>down<s%> on their <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> "By the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H3952>lapped<s%> will I <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> and deliver the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> Let all the other <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his own <S%H4725>place.<s%>"

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6720>food<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and their <S%H7782>trumpets;<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H376>all<s%> the men of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H168>tent,<s%> but <S%H2388>retained<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> was beneath him in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

It happened the same <S%H3915>night,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6965>him,<s%> "Arise, go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> for I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
But if you are <S%H3373>afraid<s%> to <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> with <S%H6513>Purah<s%> your <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp:<s%>

and you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> what they <S%H1696>say;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> will be <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>" Then went he <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6513>Purah<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> to the <S%H7097>outermost<s%> part of the armed <S%H2571>men<s%> who were in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

The <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> and all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> along in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> like <S%H697>locusts<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were without <S%H4557>number,<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> which is on the <S%H8193>seashore<s%> <S%H3220><s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

When <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> had <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H376>behold,<s%> there was a man <S%H5608>telling<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow;<s%> and he <S%H5608>said,<s%> <S%H2492>"Behold,<s%> I dreamed a <S%H2472>dream;<s%> and <S%H6742>behold,<s%> a cake of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2015>tumbled<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it so that it <S%H5307>fell,<s%> and turned it upside <S%H2015>down,<s%> so that the <S%H168>tent<s%> lay <S%H5307>flat.<s%>"

His <S%H7453>fellow<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559><s%> "This is nothing other than the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with all the <S%H4264>army.<s%>"

It was <S%H1439>so,<s%> when Gideon <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4557>telling<s%> of the <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and its <S%H7667>interpretation,<s%> that he <S%H7812>worshiped;<s%> and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand!<s%>"

He <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies,<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all of them <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3537>pitchers,<s%> with <S%H3940>torches<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>them,<s%> "Watch <S%H6213>me,<s%> and do <S%H935>likewise.<s%> Behold, when I come to the <S%H7097>outermost<s%> part of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>that,<s%> as I do, so you shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

When I <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> I and all who are with <S%H8628>me,<s%> then blow the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> also on every <S%H5439>side<s%> of all the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H559>shout,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'For Yahweh and for <S%H1439>Gideon!<s%>'"

So <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who were with <S%H935>him,<s%> came to the <S%H7097>outermost<s%> part of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H821>watch,<s%> when they had <S%H389>but<s%> <S%H6965>newly<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> the <S%H8104>watch:<s%> and they <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H5310>broke<s%> in pieces the <S%H3537>pitchers<s%> that were in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

The <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers,<s%> and <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H3940>torches<s%> in their <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> in their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> with which to <S%H8628>blow;<s%> and they <S%H7121>shouted,<s%> "The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and of <S%H1439>Gideon!<s%>"

They <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in his place <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and all the <S%H4264>army<s%> <S%H7323>ran;<s%> and they <S%H7321>shouted,<s%> and put them to <S%H5127>flight.<s%>

They <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H2719>sword<s%> against his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> and against all the <S%H4264>army;<s%> and the <S%H4264>army<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> as far as Beth <S%H1029>Shittah<s%> toward <S%H6888>Zererah,<s%> as far as the <S%H8193>border<s%> of Abel <S%H65>Meholah,<s%> by <S%H2888>Tabbath.<s%>

The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gathered <S%H6817>together<s%> out of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and out of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and out of all <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

<S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> throughout all the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> before them the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> as far as Beth <S%H1012>Barah,<s%> even the <S%H3383>Jordan!<s%>" So all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were gathered <S%H6817>together,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> as far as Beth <S%H1012>Barah,<s%> even the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

They <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb;<s%> and they <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> at the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb,<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> they <S%H2026>killed<s%> at the <S%H3342>winepress<s%> of <S%H2062>Zeeb,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> to <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
